All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
GameController
Class GameController This class is used to control the game.
Grid
Class to represent the grid of the game This class is responsible for managing the grid of the game, the pieces, the score, the level and the sounds
MainBoard
Class to create the main board of the game This class is used to create the main board of the game.
MainFrame
Class to create the main frame of the game This class is used to create the main frame of the game.
Menu
Class to create the main menu of the game This class is used to create the main menu of the game.
Piece
Class to represent the pieces in the game This class is used to represent the pieces in the game.
PieceShape
Enum to represent the shape of the pieces This enum is used to represent the shape of the pieces in the game.
SoundPlayer
Class to play sounds in the game This class is used to play sounds in the game.
TetrisColor
Enum class to define the colors of the Tetris pieces This enum class is used to define the colors of the Tetris pieces.
